Ademola Olajade Alade Aylola Lookman (amụrụ 20 Ọktoba 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-egwu egwu dị ka winger maka ọgbakọ Premier League Leicester City, na mbinye ego sitere na ọgbakọ Bundesliga RB Leipzig

Lookman mere nnukwu mpụta mbụ ya na 2015, na-egwu egwu dị ka onye na- aga n'ihu maka Charlton Athletic nke Championship, na Jenụwarị 2017 ọ bịanyere aka na Everton, onye jiri ya mee ihe dịka onye winger
Ọ nọchitere anya England site n'okpuru 19 ruo n'okpuru 21
Na 2022, Lookman nwetara ikike n'aka FIFA ka ọ nọchite anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naijiria
A mụrụ Lookman na Wandsworth, South West London nye nne na nna si Naijiria
Ọ gara St Thomas the Apostle College na Peckham ebe ọ nwetara A*s atọ na ise dịka na GCSE
Lookman sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Charlton Athletic na 2014 ka ọ bịanyere aka na Waterloo, otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ntorobịa nke dabere na mpaghara London nke Lambeth
Ihe ndekọ goolu ya maka Charlton's U18 na U21 otu mere ka ọ na-agbago ngwa ngwa site na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Charlton wee mee egwuregwu mbụ ya maka ndị Addicks na 3 November 2015
Ọ gbara ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na mmeri 3–2 na Brighton & Hove Albion na 5 Disemba 2015,  wee soro ya na goolu Charlton abụọ na agba 2–2 ya na Bolton Wanderers ụbọchị iri gachara
Lookman bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na ọkara na Everton na 5 January 2017 maka ego a na-akọwaghị, nke a kọrọ dị ka £ 7.5m mbụ nwere ike ịmalite na £ 11m na mgbakwunye
O mere mpụta mbụ ya maka klọb ụbọchị iri ka e mesịrị na mmeri 4–0 meriri Manchester City, dochie Ross Barkley na nkeji 90 ma nye goolu nke anọ nke otu ahụ
Lookman mere ihe ngosi Europe nke mbụ maka Everton na ọkpụ 1-0 meriri MFK Ružomberok na agba nke mbụ ntozu nke atọ nke Europa League

Ọ bụ ezie na onye njikwa Sam Allardyce kwuru na Lookman agaghị ahapụ mbinye ego na windo mbufe nke January 2018, ọ gbanwere obi ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mere ndokwa ịkwaga na Championship club Derby County, bụ ebe ha tụrụ anya na ọ ga-egwu egwuregwu egwuregwu mbụ
Agbanyeghị, onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ siri ọnwụ na mmegharị ọzọ, wee sonye na ọgbakọ Bundesliga RB Leipzig ruo na njedebe nke oge 2017-18
Na egwuregwu mbụ ya na Leipzig, Lookman meriri goolu mmeri na egwuregwu pụọ na Borussia Mönchengladbach ka ọ bịarutere dị ka onye nọchiri anya mmadu
Na 25 Julaị 2019, Lookman laghachiri na RB Leipzig na nkwekọrịta afọ ise, site n'otu afọ na ọkara ka ọ nwesịrị oge mgbazinye ego na-aga nke ọma na uwe German meriri nye goolu 5 na ngosi 11.
Na 30 Septemba 2020, Lookman sonyeere Fulham Premier League na mbinye ego ogologo oge
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Fulham megide Sheffield United na 18 October
Na 31 Ọgọst 2021, Lookman sonyeere Leicester City na mbinye ego ogologo oge
Na 11 Septemba 2021, o mere mpụta mbụ Leicester dị ka ihe nnọchi nkeji 73 n'oge mmeri 1-0 Manchester City meriri ha
Na 28 Disemba 2021, Lookman gbara naanị goolu na mmeri ha 1-0 meriri Liverpool
A mụrụ Lookman na England nye ndị nne na nna Naijiria, ma tozuru oke maka otu mba nke mba abụọ ahụ
Ọ natara ọkpụkpọ oku mba ụwa mbụ ya mgbe akpọrọ ya na ndị otu England U19 maka Mexico
E mechara kpọọ ya aha na ndị otu maka asọmpi European U19 n'oge ọkọchị ahụ
Na mbido 2017, Lookman jụrụ ohere iji gbanwee nkwenye na Naijiria mgbe ọ gbasasịrị site n'aka onye nchịkwa mba, Gernot Rohr
Ahọpụtara Lookman na ndị otu England na-erubeghị afọ 20 maka iko mba ụwa nke 2017 FIFA U-20
O nyere goolu atọ n'asọmpi ahụ, abụọ megide Costa Rica na 16 ikpeazụ na otu goolu megide Italy na ọkara nke ikpeazụ
England meriri Venezuela 1-0 n'ikpeazụ, iji nweta mmeri mbụ mba ahụ na ngwụcha asọmpi mba ụwa kemgbe 1966 World Cup
Ọ natara ọkpụkpọ oku mbụ ya maka ndị England na-erubeghị afọ 21 maka asọmpi European Championship qualifiers megide Netherlands under-21s na Latvia under-21s na Septemba 2017
O mere mpụta mbụ ya na egwuregwu mbụ, ma guzobe onye otu Everton Dominic Calvert-Lewin maka goolu England n'ọkpụkpụ 1-1
Lookman jụrụ Naijiria ọzọ na mbido 2018 ka ya na onye isi oche nke Nigeria Football Federation zutere
O mechara jụ usoro Naijiria nke ugboro atọ na Septemba 2018, ka onye isi nchịkwa England Gareth Southgate kwenyesiri ike na ọ bụ akụkụ nke atụmatụ ya

N'agbanyeghị okpu na ihe ịga nke ọma ya maka England na ọkwa ntorobịa, ma jụburu ụzọ Nigeria si abịarute, na Jenụwarị 2020 Nigeria Football Federation kwupụtara na Lookman ga-agbanye nkwado mba ụwa na Nigeria
Otú ọ dị, Lookman kwukwara: "Agbanwebeghị m obi m n'ịchọ ịnọchite anya England"
Na 10 Febrụwarị 2022, FIFA kwadoro arịrịọ Lookman ka ọ nọchite anya otu mba Naịjirịa
